title: Speeding Driver Kills Ecuadorian Politician's Daughter In Front Of Fiance
content: Vanessa Sagnay de la Bastida, daughter of an Ecuadorian politician, was tragically killed by a speeding Mercedes while crossing a road near Wandsworth Bridge in west London.
summary: Vanessa Sagnay de la Bastida, daughter of an Ecuadorian politician, was tragically killed by a speeding Mercedes while crossing a road near Wandsworth Bridge in west London.

title: 1 Dead, Over 140 Fall Sick After Eating Grilled Eel In Japan
content: Grilled eel, or unagi, a popular summer delicacy in Japan, is behind a department store food poisoning incident that has left more than 140 people sick and one dead, the store's president said.
summary: Grilled eel, or unagi, a popular summer delicacy in Japan, is behind a department store food poisoning incident that has left more than 140 people sick and one dead, the store's president said.

title: Did Turkey President 'Slap' Boy Who Didn't Kiss His Hand? Internet Debates
content: The footage, now viral on X, shows Recep Tayyip Erdogan extending his hand for a traditional kiss of respect from two boys brought on stage.
summary: The footage, now viral on X, shows Recep Tayyip Erdogan extending his hand for a traditional kiss of respect from two boys brought on stage.

title: Facebook Apologises For Mistakenly Censoring Iconic Photo Of Bleeding Trump
content: Meta's director of public affairs, Dani Lever, clarified the mistake and apologized, stating that fact-checkers had confirmed the original image's accuracy.
summary: Meta's director of public affairs, Dani Lever, clarified the mistake and apologized, stating that fact-checkers had confirmed the original image's accuracy.

title: Lebanon On Alert As Israel Vows "Severe" Response To Hezbollah Airstrikes
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday vowed a "severe" response to a deadly strike that killed 12 youths in the annexed Golan Heights, as diplomats raced to contain escalation between Israel and Hezbollah.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday vowed a "severe" response to a deadly strike that killed 12 youths in the annexed Golan Heights, as diplomats raced to contain escalation between Israel and Hezbollah.

title: Apple Used Google's Chips To Train Two AI Models, Research Paper Shows
content: Apple's decision to rely on Google's cloud infrastructure is notable because Nvidia produces the most sought-after AI processors.

title: 1 Dead As Protesters Clash With Cops After Disputed Venezuela Poll Results
content: At least one person died Monday in Venezuela as security forces tried to break up protests triggered by a hotly disputed election result that gave Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro a third term in power, an NGO said.
summary: At least one person died Monday in Venezuela as security forces tried to break up protests triggered by a hotly disputed election result that gave Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro a third term in power, an NGO said.

title: Instagram Influencers Can Soon Reply To Your DMs Using Meta AI Chatbot
content: The AI Studio will let users create customized AI characters and also allow Instagram creators to use AI characters "as an extension of themselves." Users can share their AI characters on the social media giant's various platforms.
summary: The AI Studio will let users create customized AI characters and also allow Instagram creators to use AI characters "as an extension of themselves." Users can share their AI characters on the social media giant's various platforms.

title: Woman Sent To Jail For Overfeeding 53 Kg Dog To Death In New Zealand

title: Explainer: Why The Israel-Hezbollah Conflict Is Heating Up Again
content: A deadly rocket strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights has added to concerns that Israel and the Iran-backed Lebanese group Hezbollah could be sucked into a full-scale war.

title: Trump Reacts To JD Vance's "Childless Cat Ladies" Jab At Kamala Harris
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Monday backed his running mate, Senator JD Vance, over past comments about "childless cat ladies" that have gone viral and become a political headache for their White House campaign.

title: Peru Orders Venezuelan Diplomats To Leave Within 72 Hours

title: "I'm Very Open-Minded, But...": Trump Slams Paris 2024 Opening Ceremony
content: US Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Monday called the Olympics opening ceremony in Paris a "disgrace," after its creators came under fire for what some said was a show gone too far.

title: Elon Musk Faces Criticism Over Deepfake Kamala Harris Video

title: Quad Foreign Ministers Warn Of Terrorists Using New Technology

title: Israel's Foreign Minister Calls On NATO To Expel Turkey
content: Israel's foreign minister on Monday called on NATO to expel Turkey as a member of the organization, in a move likely to further raise tensions between the countries.

title: Lebanon Airport Flights Cancelled Or Delayed Amid Israeli Attack Fears
content: Flights to and from Beirut airport were cancelled or delayed on Monday as tensions escalated between Israel and armed political group Hezbollah after a strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children and teenagers.
summary: Flights to and from Beirut airport were cancelled or delayed on Monday as tensions escalated between Israel and armed political group Hezbollah after a strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children and teenagers.
